1:
À Dagwi Darwey, hwo gyong me na shom wɛt!
Hwo tabak me vět wɛt!
2:
Tosho reyɔm hom, ma ga tɛ́ me gbɛrɛk!
Me ra dedan, tɛ̀ me wɛng-wɛng!
3:
Ma saa e ji reyɔm, gwoněng reyɔm,
ko hwó gyeng, na hwo sɛlɛ me e yɛ̌ jeng ɛ?
4:
Yē rɔ̀s a shom mō! Sey me, à Dagwi Darwey!
Sey me yi e reku, yaga hwà tɛ̀ yey na me.
5:
Jeng de ma ku, mê tɔk to bare na hwo wɛt,
vit a hwak de ê tɔk somo hwo e kwɔ̂n bevuvwel.
6:
Ma ga tɛ́ me fɛkfɛk yaga rus.
Mwa turuk ma sé tosho,
gwat hom gwa tɛ́ ɛ varak na nemwishil.
7:
Bayis hom ba sé hywiinin, ba ga tɛ́ ɛn shǔt yaga sesin,
bemât repugu hom vɛ de ba tɛ̀ ano.
8:
Gas in na me, a yin bemât ragâs neves!
Dagwi Darwey a ga wok tosho hom.
9:
Dagwi Darwey a ga sey dâk gabɔk hom
yɛ a ga sey won hom.
10:
Ê tɛ̀ bemât repugu hom, be sɔ rekyen, be vow,
bê pere tele, ko rekyen rê kyiri hɛn.
